songs.title: Ladder to the Sun
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
From the very start, it
Came apart, it
Broke up into pieces and
There was a chance I could've missed it
It could risked it
But I put myself into your hands

[Chorus]
'Cause you're not just anyone
You're a ladder to the sun
Oh, you're not just anyone
You're a ladder to the sun

[Verse 2]
I should've run my courses
For the opposing forces
And all men are just mortals, and
If you want me, you can have me
Take me, oh baby, grab me
'Cause if you want me, then you can have me

[Chorus]
'Cause you're not just anyone
You're a ladder to the sun
Oh, you're not just anyone
You're a ladder to the sun

[Bridge]
Oh now boy, what you been and done
You set a course that you couldn't run
Oh now boy, what you been and done

[Verse 3]
I had it all and I risked it
A chance and I missed it
I had it and I risked it all
And I risked it all

[Outro]
I risked it all
A ladder to the
A ladder to the sun
A ladder to the
A ladder to the sun
A ladder to the
A ladder to the sun
I had it all and I risked it all

A ladder to the
A ladder to the sun
A ladder to the
A ladder to the sun
I had it all and I risked it all
